creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund, by exchange
description: From a portfolio of 75 mixed media works on paper, title sheet, edition sheet, index sheet, housed loose in a silk-lined black faux-leather clamshell portfolio box with title printed in silver on cover and spine
medium: Black buckram and silk clamshell box with blood of the artist on inside back cover
provenance: Heavy Industry Publications, Hollywood, Calif. (the artist); sold to the MIA, 1971.
title: Portfolio Box for Stains
